oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood to his wife Cordelia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood, Co. D, 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA to his wife Cordelia. He discusses his life in the army and sleeping on a 6 by 4 bunk with straw. He also talks about the regiment mustering in, his pay, and wearing his stripes. Atwood was at Johnsonville at the time of the battle on Nov. 4, 1864.
